website_summaries.verdict: An alternative to traditional henna kits and perfect for kids who want henna-style tattoos. Ideal for sleepovers and birthday parties.
pros: Ink can last for several days or until removed with soapy water
Ideal for kids but also worth considering for adults and novices who don't want to commit to traditional henna techniques
Includes 3 tattoo pens and 2 metallic shimmer writers
cons: Not recommended for kids under age 6

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for tweens
customer_reviews.text: This product kept my kids busy for a solid hour. They were engrossed it in. The instruction were easy for them to follow, and they didn’t leave a giant mess behind! I found it to entertain them while being harmless and easy clean up at the same time. It comes off much easier than the water tattoos. I think it’s a fun gift for tweens. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: D. R.

customer_reviews.title: Such a joke
customer_reviews.text: Would give 0 stars if possible. Their claim that it last several days is a flat out lie. It didn't even last an hour despite keeping away from soap and water. These are washable markers you can get at the dollar store, nothing more. Total joke.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon P.

customer_reviews.title: Worthwhile
customer_reviews.text: My 9yr old loved this. The whole family got tattoos lol.
customer_reviews.author: Portia

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for girls of all ages!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my 10 year old granddaughter for when she comes to visit and it has become her favorite project. She uses it on herself and on me! It stays on all day but washes right off in the shower!
customer_reviews.author: Slwells

customer_reviews.title: Was a hit w/my daughter & the entire neighborhood
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my daughter as a gift. She loves them so much that she used it all in less than a week as all the neighborhood kids got one too. So will give again as a gift (as she was upset that by the time everyone got 1 that was all she had as suddenly a friend of a friend or relative showed up & she didn't want to be rude). So this time it won't be able to leave the house.
customer_reviews.author: Nicky

customer_reviews.title: Kids really liked playing with it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this on Amazon, after already buying one in the past from a different retailer. My kids and their friends really enjoyed playing with it and that's why I decided to get another. The product itself is just 2 pens and 2 tubes of glitter with some stickers... so, it's not ravishing, if it was cheaper, then I'd probably give it 5 stars instead. The plus on this, is that the color showed up even on darker toned skin and it was just really fun and simple to use. Washes off with water and no mess!
customer_reviews.author: Saffie

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh basically markers
customer_reviews.text: This henna kit is basically markers with some stencils. The markers wash off very easily. Which I guess is good for kids, but my daughter was expecting a little bit more time with her designs.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Box is nearly empty. Stencils are hard to use. Accent shimmer takes forever to dry. Smudges and washes off. Basically, it’s a ton of work and washes off before it can be enjoyed.
customer_reviews.author: D. Birmingham

customer_reviews.title: great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for a child about 8 years old and up. Washes off easily so parents don't have to worry about it stains clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Miller

customer_reviews.title: Needs adult to help
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. My girls (12 and 13) didn't care, but I was disappointed. The stencils are near impossible to use with the paint, and they needed adult help to get it all done.
customer_reviews.author: Wunjo Mama

customer_reviews.title: Not actual henna
customer_reviews.text: Ok product for young children. Not something you would want to buy for an actual henna art. Its liquid and washes right off
customer_reviews.author: Shirley VanDorp

customer_reviews.title: Girls love it!
customer_reviews.text: Girls this age love this product will keep them busy for a while!
customer_reviews.author: mona lisa ortega

customer_reviews.title: It’s like drawing poop on your skin
customer_reviews.text: Everything is washable and doesn’t stay on. Henna is supposed to stain you skin, and this doesn’t. It’s like drawing poop on your skin. The glitter henna is Weird. Thing of the stickiest thing you can imagine and that what that is.
customer_reviews.author: Julz2024

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied, my daughter's need for a henna kit, and my need to not spend a lot of money on it.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted a henna kit for her birthday. I didn't want to spend a lot of money on one. It was a win win for both of us!
customer_reviews.author: kristen m. alfonso

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS.
customer_reviews.text: I am so mad, this is a rip off. it's worth$5.00 not 19.99. The stencils fall apart and it comes with 5 things.
customer_reviews.author: VENUS

customer_reviews.title: Gave this to my daughter for Christmas and she loves ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my daughter for Christmas and she loves it. All of her friends keep wanting to know where I got it.
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Shows up on all skin tones
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old daughter loved it! It actually shows up on darker skin and it lasts a few days!
customer_reviews.author: CaliGirl

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly great
customer_reviews.text: My niece is impossible to shop for. I bought her this as a hail merry and she loved it. The henna is in easily usable markers. It washes off easily and the patters that it comes with are very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably priced to make a 10 year old happy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was thrilled with this. The stencils are stickers that we were able to get a few used out of. Now she just free hands the tatoos.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Do it yourself
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year daughter was not impressed with this set. You can easily make this yourself with stencils and washable markers. Suitable for younger kids as it doesn't really look like true Henna.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Washes off
customer_reviews.text: This is cute but it washes off really easily. We were hoping for something more permanent. If you want henna that can come off in one wash this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amy J.

customer_reviews.title: Fun and washable
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves to draw on herself and me, I’m happy that I can easily wash it off.
customer_reviews.author: H2olvr

customer_reviews.title: Clean and Easy
customer_reviews.text: Kinda cool and easy top use. Liked it better than most other temporary tattoo kits with the glitter and other junk that is messy.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron R

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Easy to use, very nice stencil, comes off easy if you make a mistake. Cons: Smudges, the stencil adhesive is only good for 2x use. Will come off after bathing 2x.
customer_reviews.author: MEG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice for the price for kids, tweens, teens and adults!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer VanScyoc

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice product, but washes off with first contact of water.
customer_reviews.author: SL Perrine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not permanent ink it wiped off when it dries pretty easy but all in all it still looks cool
customer_reviews.author: Gary Horne

customer_reviews.title: Quick Easy Clean Up Fun
customer_reviews.text: My niece had a great time with these. They didn't stay on for a really long time, but was a fun thing to play with that lasted for a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith E.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not worth more than $1 barely anything in the package and terrible quality.
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Definitely not worth more than $1 barely anything in the package and terrible quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nell

customer_reviews.title: Good henna kit for kids
customer_reviews.text: My daughter (13 years old) enjoyed this to create henna designs.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: it's awesome. She found it easy to use
customer_reviews.text: From my daughter's point of view, she's 7, it's awesome. She found it easy to use. I like that it washed right off. The designs are kind of cool. I do not like that it is manufactured in China. That would be why I did not give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jean C

customer_reviews.title: What you see is what you get
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for 10-year old girls and they did enjoy it. Look closely at the cover because what you see is what you get--some pens and stick on stencils. It is very basic. It wasn't too messy though!
customer_reviews.author: Also an author

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good starter set for kid who wont stop drawling on their arms with pens...and don't stay on super long
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Markers, not Henna.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe husband just didn't read correctly, but this is not Henna; it's markers.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Electra

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Pens are dried out and barely show up on skin.
customer_reviews.author: Thesweetlyford

customer_reviews.title: Hated it it was not a henna kit it was ...
customer_reviews.text: Hated it it was not a henna kit it was nothing but felt tip makers however it is great for kids because it washes right off.
customer_reviews.author: regina dow

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter was thrilled with her gift. Now all my other granddaughters want one!
customer_reviews.author: jonahmax

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price. My daughter really enjoyed this. The stencils work well.
customer_reviews.author: Julias Mom

customer_reviews.title: My child was happy to receive this for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a higher level of henna, this one is made with washable markers. My child was happy to receive this for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Juile L. Schuett

customer_reviews.title: Really is a truly kid friendly product! So much fun
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old niece had so much with this! Easy clean up and a great first experience with henna. Would definitely order this again!
customer_reviews.author: Darcey C. Neves

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Simple markers and stencils and they stencils were only good for two times
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: Great for younger kids as it's washable. My daughter is 12 and is looking for something a little more authentic.
customer_reviews.author: Kauai Q

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift for my 8 year old daughter
customer_reviews.text: Fun gift for my 8 year old daughter. She and her friends had a great time using it at a sleepover. They started with the included stencils and soon were confident enough to try some freehand designs. Washes off fairly easily if done quickly, but has staying power through a couple baths if allowed to dry.
customer_reviews.author: bethany

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT LIKE THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this product it was rubbing all over the place and the "henna" is not real henna the markers are just normal markers and the tubes of "gel" is not real gel it's like glitter glue I was very disappointed and it was not satisfing because if you use it any where the design is blury and smeering .
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product
customer_reviews.text: Horrible even for young children. It never dries, it got all over my daughter's bed linens she put it on and started using it about 11 o'clock in the morning and by the time she peeled the decal 90% of the henna came off with it I would definitely NOT recommend this to a friend I would definitely recommend more of an adult style Hennah and of course as a parent I supervised and she absolutely loved it when it was done with a more adult type henna so for a few extra dollars and my daughter's happiness totally worth it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a great kit and a lot of product
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my granddaughter and she and I have had a ball using it . It's a great kit and a lot of product. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even last an hour.
customer_reviews.text: The henna started pealing off in less than an hour. My daughter was a little disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice. I am sure she will have fun with ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a Christmas gift after daughter got a Henna tattoo on vacation. Looks nice. I am sure she will have fun with it!
customer_reviews.author: Betsie

customer_reviews.title: My 12 year old girl loves it and are having a blast drawing on all the neighbor kids
customer_reviews.text: My girls love it and are having a blast. Washes off the same day if needed so this is a plus if you have church in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Nate or Marilinda

customer_reviews.title: Product it's self is just not very good
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what was stated. Product it's self is just not very good quality
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a failure!
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered Alex items before but highly disappointed with this one. The markers were dry and barely made it through one of the small heart tattoos. Dollar store quality. Will not recommend. Even for smaller children, not worth the money to get less than two minutes of entertainment. You failed on this one ALEX.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves tattoos I know she will love this.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: The "henna" looks nice when it's first applied but after one washing it's ...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing product for sure. My daughter has just been to a henna party and we bought this "Totally Henna" from Alex so she could make henna tattoos at home for herself and her friends. The "henna" looks nice when it's first applied but after one washing it's gone. This is not henna. This is an overpriced package of washable magic markers. My 8 year old is in tears because she's so disappointed with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Girl

customer_reviews.title: Just 3 markers And some stickers
customer_reviews.text: Markers! Not even markers made to write on skin. Just a light brown, darkish brown and red marker and some stickers.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: They washed off after 1 use- thought it would have stayed on longer.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Henderson Bianchi

product_meta.title: Alex Spa Totally Henna Deluxe Set Girls Fashion Activity
product_meta.description: ALEX Spa Totally Henna Deluxe Set, lets you adorn yourself with easy and instant Henna tattoos! Use stencils to create detailed designs and add shimmering highlights with a shimmer writers. Add some sticky gems to add dimension and shine! The tattoos last for several days unless washed off with soap and water. Includes 3 Tattoo Pens (.046oz / 1.3ml), 2 Metallic Shimmer Writers (.3oz / 9ml), 10 Stencil Stickers, 12 Adhesive Gems and Easy Instructions. Recommended for children 6 years of age and older.
feature_bullets: Adorn yourself with easy and instant Henna tattoos
Lasts for several days unless washed off with soap and water
Great party or sleep over activity
Includes 3 Tattoo Pens, 2 Metallic Shimmer Writers, 10 Stencil Stickers, 12 Adhesive Gems and Easy Instructions
Recommended for children 6 years of age and older

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars242 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
